text: José Canalejas y Casas (1827–1902) was a Spanish engineer, writer and politician. == Biography == Born in December 1827 in Barcelona. He studied industrial engineering in Liège. He was the father of Spanish prime minister, José Canalejas Méndez. He died in Madrid in November 1902. == Works == * Anuario de los progresos de la industria y la agricultura (1861) == References == ;Informational notes ;Citations ;Bibliography * * * Category:1827 births Category:1902 deaths Category:Spanish engineers Category:Politicians from Barcelona Category:Writers from Barcelona
title: José Canalejas y Casas
